parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: Commodity
parameters.description: The information about the order placed in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace. You do not need to specify this parameter if the service is not published in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace or uses the pay-as-you-go billing method.

parameters.name: ContactGroup
parameters.description: The alert contact group.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request to check information such as the permissions and instance status. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs a dry run for the request, but does not create a service instance.
*   **false**: performs a dry run for the request, and creates a service instance if the request passes the dry run.

parameters.name: EnableInstanceOps
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the service instance supports the hosted O\&M feature. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: EnableUserPrometheus
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the Prometheus monitoring feature. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The serviceInstance name.

parameters.name: OperationMetadata
parameters.description: The operation metadata.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description:
The parameters that the customer specifies to deploy the service instance.

>  If region information is required to create a service instance, you must specify the region ID in the value of Parameters.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou).
*   ap-southeast-1: Singapore.

parameters.name: ResourceAutoPay
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to automatically deduct the resource fees from the account balance. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID.

parameters.name: ServiceId
parameters.description: The service ID.

parameters.name: ServiceInstanceId
parameters.description: The trial service instance id witch you want to convert to formal

parameters.name: ServiceVersion
parameters.description: The service version.

parameters.name: SpecificationCode
parameters.description: Specification code.

parameters.name: SpecificationName
parameters.description: The package name.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags.

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the template.

parameters.name: TrialType
parameters.description:
The trial type of the service instance. Valid values:

*   **Trial**: Trials are supported.
*   **NotTrial**: Trials are not supported.
